(* For primitive integers and floats  *)
From Coq Require Numbers.Cyclic.Int63.Int63 Floats.PrimFloat Floats.FloatAxioms.
From MetaCoq.Template Require Import utils AstUtils BasicAst Ast Reflect Environment Induction.
Require Import ssreflect.
From Equations Require Import Equations.

Local Infix "==?" := eqb (at level 20).

Ltac finish :=
  let h := fresh "h" in
  right ;
  match goal with
  | e : ?t <> ?u |- _ =>
    intro h ; apply e ; now inversion h
  end.

Ltac fcase c :=
  let e := fresh "e" in
  case c ; intro e ; [ subst ; try (left ; reflexivity) | finish ].

Ltac term_dec_tac term_dec :=
  repeat match goal with
         | t : term, u : term |- _ => fcase (term_dec t u)
         | u : Universe.t, u' : Universe.t |- _ => fcase (eq_dec u u')
         | x : Instance.t, y : Instance.t |- _ =>
           fcase (eq_dec x y)
         | x : list Level.t, y : Instance.t |- _ =>
           fcase (eq_dec x y)
         | x : list aname, y : list aname |- _ =>
           fcase (eq_dec x y)
         | n : nat, m : nat |- _ => fcase (Nat.eq_dec n m)
         | i : ident, i' : ident |- _ => fcase (string_dec i i')
         | i : kername, i' : kername |- _ => fcase (kername_eq_dec i i')
         | i : string, i' : kername |- _ => fcase (string_dec i i')
         | n : name, n' : name |- _ => fcase (eq_dec n n')
         | n : aname, n' : aname |- _ => fcase (eq_dec n n')
         | i : inductive, i' : inductive |- _ => fcase (eq_dec i i')
         | x : inductive * nat, y : inductive * nat |- _ =>
           fcase (eq_dec x y)
         | x : case_info, y : case_info |- _ =>
           fcase (eq_dec x y)
         | x : projection, y : projection |- _ => fcase (eq_dec x y)
         | x : cast_kind, y : cast_kind |- _ => fcase (eq_dec x y)
         end.


term:Type
H:EqDec term
EqDec (predicate term)

term:Type
H:EqDec term
preturn:term
puinst0:Instance.t
pparams0:list term
pcontext0:list aname
preturn0:term
{{|
 puinst := puinst0;
 pparams := pparams0;
 pcontext := pcontext0;
 preturn := preturn |} =
 {|
 puinst := puinst0;
 pparams := pparams0;
 pcontext := pcontext0;
 preturn := preturn0 |}} +
{{|
 puinst := puinst0;
 pparams := pparams0;
 pcontext := pcontext0;
 preturn := preturn |} <>
 {|
 puinst := puinst0;
 pparams := pparams0;
 pcontext := pcontext0;
 preturn := preturn0 |}}

  fcase (eq_dec preturn preturn0).
Defined.

Derive NoConfusion NoConfusionHom for term.

  (fun x : term =>
   forall y : term, {x = y} + {x <> y})

{tFix m idx <> tFix mfix idx}

{tCoFix [] idx = tCoFix (d :: m0) idx} +
{tCoFix [] idx <> tCoFix (d :: m0) idx}

Defined.

Instance reflect_term : ReflectEq term :=
  let h := EqDec_ReflectEq term in _.

Instance eqb_ctx : ReflectEq context := _.

Definition eqb_constant_body (x y : constant_body) :=
  let (tyx, bodyx, univx) := x in
  let (tyy, bodyy, univy) := y in
  eqb tyx tyy && eqb bodyx bodyy && eqb univx univy.


ReflectEq constant_body


ReflectEq constant_body

  
forall x y : constant_body,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_constant_body x y)

  
cst_type0:term
cst_body0:option term
cst_universes0:universes_decl
cst_type1:term
cst_body1:option term
cst_universes1:universes_decl
reflect
  ({|
   cst_type := cst_type0;
   cst_body := cst_body0;
   cst_universes := cst_universes0 |} =
   {|
   cst_type := cst_type1;
   cst_body := cst_body1;
   cst_universes := cst_universes1 |})
  (eqb_constant_body
     {|
     cst_type := cst_type0;
     cst_body := cst_body0;
     cst_universes := cst_universes0 |}
     {|
     cst_type := cst_type1;
     cst_body := cst_body1;
     cst_universes := cst_universes1 |})

  unfold eqb_constant_body; finish_reflect.
Defined.

Definition eqb_constructor_body (x y : constructor_body) :=
  x.(cstr_name) ==? y.(cstr_name) &&
  x.(cstr_args) ==? y.(cstr_args) &&
  x.(cstr_indices) ==? y.(cstr_indices) &&
  x.(cstr_type) ==? y.(cstr_type) &&
  x.(cstr_arity) ==? y.(cstr_arity).


ReflectEq constructor_body


ReflectEq constructor_body

  
forall x y : constructor_body,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_constructor_body x y)

  
cstr_name0:ident
cstr_args0:context
cstr_indices0:list term
cstr_type0:term
cstr_arity0:nat
cstr_name1:ident
cstr_args1:context
cstr_indices1:list term
cstr_type1:term
cstr_arity1:nat
reflect
  ({|
   cstr_name := cstr_name0;
   cstr_args := cstr_args0;
   cstr_indices := cstr_indices0;
   cstr_type := cstr_type0;
   cstr_arity := cstr_arity0 |} =
   {|
   cstr_name := cstr_name1;
   cstr_args := cstr_args1;
   cstr_indices := cstr_indices1;
   cstr_type := cstr_type1;
   cstr_arity := cstr_arity1 |})
  (eqb_constructor_body
     {|
     cstr_name := cstr_name0;
     cstr_args := cstr_args0;
     cstr_indices := cstr_indices0;
     cstr_type := cstr_type0;
     cstr_arity := cstr_arity0 |}
     {|
     cstr_name := cstr_name1;
     cstr_args := cstr_args1;
     cstr_indices := cstr_indices1;
     cstr_type := cstr_type1;
     cstr_arity := cstr_arity1 |})

  
cstr_name0:ident
cstr_args0:context
cstr_indices0:list term
cstr_type0:term
cstr_arity0:nat
cstr_name1:ident
cstr_args1:context
cstr_indices1:list term
cstr_type1:term
cstr_arity1:nat
reflect
  ({|
   cstr_name := cstr_name0;
   cstr_args := cstr_args0;
   cstr_indices := cstr_indices0;
   cstr_type := cstr_type0;
   cstr_arity := cstr_arity0 |} =
   {|
   cstr_name := cstr_name1;
   cstr_args := cstr_args1;
   cstr_indices := cstr_indices1;
   cstr_type := cstr_type1;
   cstr_arity := cstr_arity1 |})
  (cstr_name0 ==? cstr_name1 &&
   cstr_args0 ==? cstr_args1 &&
   cstr_indices0 ==? cstr_indices1 &&
   cstr_type0 ==? cstr_type1 &&
   cstr_arity0 ==? cstr_arity1)
 finish_reflect.
Defined.
  
Definition eqb_one_inductive_body (x y : one_inductive_body) :=
  x.(ind_name) ==? y.(ind_name) &&
  x.(ind_indices) ==? y.(ind_indices) &&
  x.(ind_sort) ==? y.(ind_sort) &&
  x.(ind_type) ==? y.(ind_type) &&
  x.(ind_kelim) ==? y.(ind_kelim) &&
  x.(ind_ctors) ==? y.(ind_ctors) &&
  x.(ind_projs) ==? y.(ind_projs) &&
  x.(ind_relevance) ==? y.(ind_relevance).


ReflectEq one_inductive_body


ReflectEq one_inductive_body

  
forall x y : one_inductive_body,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_one_inductive_body x y)

  
ind_name0:ident
ind_indices0:context
ind_sort0:Universe.t
ind_type0:term
ind_kelim0:allowed_eliminations
ind_ctors0:list constructor_body
ind_projs0:list (ident √ó term)
ind_relevance0:relevance
ind_name1:ident
ind_indices1:context
ind_sort1:Universe.t
ind_type1:term
ind_kelim1:allowed_eliminations
ind_ctors1:list constructor_body
ind_projs1:list (ident √ó term)
ind_relevance1:relevance
reflect
  ({|
   ind_name := ind_name0;
   ind_indices := ind_indices0;
   ind_sort := ind_sort0;
   ind_type := ind_type0;
   ind_kelim := ind_kelim0;
   ind_ctors := ind_ctors0;
   ind_projs := ind_projs0;
   ind_relevance := ind_relevance0 |} =
   {|
   ind_name := ind_name1;
   ind_indices := ind_indices1;
   ind_sort := ind_sort1;
   ind_type := ind_type1;
   ind_kelim := ind_kelim1;
   ind_ctors := ind_ctors1;
   ind_projs := ind_projs1;
   ind_relevance := ind_relevance1 |})
  (eqb_one_inductive_body
     {|
     ind_name := ind_name0;
     ind_indices := ind_indices0;
     ind_sort := ind_sort0;
     ind_type := ind_type0;
     ind_kelim := ind_kelim0;
     ind_ctors := ind_ctors0;
     ind_projs := ind_projs0;
     ind_relevance := ind_relevance0 |}
     {|
     ind_name := ind_name1;
     ind_indices := ind_indices1;
     ind_sort := ind_sort1;
     ind_type := ind_type1;
     ind_kelim := ind_kelim1;
     ind_ctors := ind_ctors1;
     ind_projs := ind_projs1;
     ind_relevance := ind_relevance1 |})

  unfold eqb_one_inductive_body; cbn -[eqb]; finish_reflect.
Defined.

Definition eqb_mutual_inductive_body (x y : mutual_inductive_body) :=
  let (f, n, p, b, u, v) := x in
  let (f', n', p', b', u', v') := y in
  eqb f f' && eqb n n' && eqb b b' && eqb p p' && eqb u u' && eqb v v'.


ReflectEq mutual_inductive_body


ReflectEq mutual_inductive_body

  
forall x y : mutual_inductive_body,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_mutual_inductive_body x y)

  
ind_finite0:recursivity_kind
ind_npars0:nat
ind_params0:context
ind_bodies0:list one_inductive_body
ind_universes0:universes_decl
ind_variance0:option (list Variance.t)
ind_finite1:recursivity_kind
ind_npars1:nat
ind_params1:context
ind_bodies1:list one_inductive_body
ind_universes1:universes_decl
ind_variance1:option (list Variance.t)
reflect
  ({|
   ind_finite := ind_finite0;
   ind_npars := ind_npars0;
   ind_params := ind_params0;
   ind_bodies := ind_bodies0;
   ind_universes := ind_universes0;
   ind_variance := ind_variance0 |} =
   {|
   ind_finite := ind_finite1;
   ind_npars := ind_npars1;
   ind_params := ind_params1;
   ind_bodies := ind_bodies1;
   ind_universes := ind_universes1;
   ind_variance := ind_variance1 |})
  (eqb_mutual_inductive_body
     {|
     ind_finite := ind_finite0;
     ind_npars := ind_npars0;
     ind_params := ind_params0;
     ind_bodies := ind_bodies0;
     ind_universes := ind_universes0;
     ind_variance := ind_variance0 |}
     {|
     ind_finite := ind_finite1;
     ind_npars := ind_npars1;
     ind_params := ind_params1;
     ind_bodies := ind_bodies1;
     ind_universes := ind_universes1;
     ind_variance := ind_variance1 |})

  unfold eqb_mutual_inductive_body; finish_reflect.
Defined.

Definition eqb_global_decl x y :=
  match x, y with
  | ConstantDecl cst, ConstantDecl cst' => eqb cst cst'
  | InductiveDecl mib, InductiveDecl mib' => eqb mib mib'
  | _, _ => false
  end.


ReflectEq global_decl


ReflectEq global_decl

  
forall x y : global_decl,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_global_decl x y)

  
forall x y : global_decl,
reflect (x = y)
  match x with
  | ConstantDecl cst =>
      match y with
      | ConstantDecl cst' => cst ==? cst'
      | InductiveDecl _ => false
      end
  | InductiveDecl mib =>
      match y with
      | ConstantDecl _ => false
      | InductiveDecl mib' => mib ==? mib'
      end
  end

  intros [] []; finish_reflect.
Defined.
